participant_2.background:
I m currently looking for employment.
I am a mother of two.
I can speak three languages english , french and spanish.
I am colour blind.

content.text: Hello, what are you looking for in a friend?
I am looking for a friend who is kind, compassionate, and understanding.
I am all of those things! What are your interests?
I love to read, write, and travel. I am also a huge fan of football.
Me too! I love watching football with my friends.
That's great! I am currently looking for employment. I am a mother of two and can speak three languages.
Oh wow, that's impressive! I am also a mother of two. I work as a nurse.
That's great! I am looking for a job that is flexible with my family.
I see, I am sure you will find something.
You're welcome! I am glad we are friends.
